Name: Wizards
About the game: Battle against friends and foes in all-out wizard warfare. Use the elements to crush your opponents, with various spells to choose from. Whether it's summoning the undead, freezing your opponents, or blasting your opponent away with fireballs, you can customize the way you want to play. Become the wizard you want, whether by summoning creatures to do your bidding, or casting spells to become a master of destruction. Tactically crush your opponents in a one-on-one setting, or team up with your friends in a matchmade round to become the ultimate strategy master. With a massive range of possibilities, no two games are the same.
